title: shader
description: A vertex or fragment shader.  WebGL: see createShader(), deleteShader(), shaderSource(), compileShader(), getShaderParameter(), and getShaderInfoLog().

name.description: The user-defined name of this shader.  This is not necessarily unique among shaders.

uri.description: The uri of the GLSL source.  Relative paths are relative to the .json file.  Instead of referencing an external file, the uri can also be a data-uri.

type.description: Specifies the shader stage.  Allowed values are 35632 (FRAGMENT_SHADER) and 35633 (VERTEX_SHADER).
